ygData.subject: Re: Taunting Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: At level 4 my taunting skill is around 15-20.  You don t have to put any points into it since you start out with that skill.  I just keep hitting it everytime
ygData.messageBody:
At level 4 my taunting skill is around 15-20. You don't have to put any
points into it since you start out with that skill. I just keep hitting it
everytime I get into a fight and it seems to go up pretty quickly.

-Kalamar(E'ci)


-----Original Message-----
From: Thang Tran <tdt7@...>
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 12:49 PM
Subject: [eqpaladin] Taunting Skill


>From: "Thang Tran" <tdt7@...>
>
>Hi
>I was wondering when the taunting skill goes up because since I first
>started, I taunted everytime I fought a creature. Now I'm on lvl 6
>but the skill is still less than feeble. Do I have to put practice
>points on it first or doesn't it raise until a certain lvl?
>
>Elthain of Felwithe
>Paladin of Tunare
>Mithaniel Marr server
